sentences.en: Astronomers have seen gargantuan plumes of material from nearer galaxies as well.
sentences.cn: 天文学家也看到过较近的星系伸出的巨大的羽状物.

sentences.en: Falk even persuaded Nike to spend at least $ 1 million marketing Jordan, a gargantuan sum at the time.
sentences.cn: 福尔克甚至说服耐克公司至少花了100万美元去推销乔丹, 这在当时是一笔巨额款项.

sentences.en: Gargantuan asteroid to pass near Earth this fall.
sentences.cn: 大量小行星今秋将与地球错身而过.

sentences.en: Like China, Vietnam is open, but unlike its gargantuan neighbour it consistently run trade deficits.
sentences.cn: 像中国一样, 越南也开放了经济, 但与其庞大的邻国不同,越南的贸易一直处于逆差.

sentences.en: My gargantuan, pristine machine was good for writing papers and playing solitaire, and that was all.
sentences.cn: 我那庞大的 、 早期的计算机只适合写文章和玩纸牌游戏, 就这些.

sentences.en: The Allies assembled a gargantuan naval armada, from battleships and destroyers to landing and coasters.
sentences.cn: 同时盟军集结了大批的海军舰艇, 从战列舰、驱逐舰到登陆艇、小船.

sentences.en: The Allies assembled a gargantuan naval armada, from battleships and destroyers to landing craft and coasters.
sentences.cn: 盟军组成了一支庞大的海军舰队, 从战列舰、驱逐舰到登陆艇以及运输艇等.

sentences.en: Two more of the massive beasts swung a gargantuan battering ram against the city's main gates.
sentences.cn: (囧)另外两只粗壮的食人魔则摇动着庞大的攻城锤撞向主城大门.
